name: IceLab
description:
Survival/builder game for 2020 Unreal Spring Jam, featuring a floating ice mass and its dweller bear. Theme is "What is hidden in snow comes forth in the thaw".

Input:

  • Move: WASD & Mouse
  • Pull: Right Mouse Button
  • Interact: E & R
  • Build: F
  • Upgrade: Q
  • Quit: Alt + F4

Story:

An incident happened in an arctic laboratory, now its remains are floating on the ocean in a frozen state. You have to gather resources and build a small floating base in the ocean to reach the shore. You have to use the ice as it is or melt it to access the metal parts inside (for theme).

I couldn't focus too much on gameplay, instead I tried a lot of marketplace contents since Epic Games is giving away a lot of them lately.  Also because of these contents, especially Boris the Bear, game size is quite big.

Marketplace Contents:

  • Ability Pack - Telekinesis
  • Chameleon Post Process
  • Craft Resources Icons
  • Sound Phenomenon Fantasy Orchestra
  • FX Variety Pack
  • GOOD SKY
  • Ice Cool
  • Paragon: Boris
  • Player Build System
  • SHADERSOURCE - Tropical Ocean Tool
